title: Top lane
body: I'm thinking about buying another champion for top lane as a bruiser or AD. Who should I get?

replies.body:
{{champion:54}} 

there is no reason to play anything else

Hecarim is fun up top, I tried him out during his free week and it's pretty awesome. Your roam and escape potential is great. He's on my list after I pick up Renekton. Darius is also really fun, he's banned a good bit of the time, but I love him.
Who do you own and like to play currently?

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dWz143rJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-25T21:55:29.653+0000)
>
> Who do you own and like to play currently?

I would like to play talon, Rengar, Gallo, hecarim, or jarvan IV. I have cho'gath, garen, nunu, and amumu
